alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 12:36PM MST until January 06 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected by late afternoon. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, Denver, Greeley, and Byers. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org
